```py
def find_nth(haystack, needle, n):
    start = haystack.find(needle)
    while start >= 0 and n > 1:
        start = haystack.find(needle, start+len(needle))
        n -= 1
    return start
```

```py
from textproc import find_nth

segment = line[:find_nth(line, ',', 4)].strip()
```
